ActStatutory Instruments Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Statutory Instruments Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS REGULATIONS in order to align the Statutory Instruments Regulations with the repeal of section 13 of the Statutory Instruments Act with a view to (1) reduce costs; (2) avoid duplication; and (3) contribute to the Governmentâ€™s commitment to sustainable development.
